document.full_text: in the days since dominique strauss-kahn's arrest for the attempted rape of a hotel maid, lurid details of the ex-imf chief's past sexual exploits -- both alleged and admitted -- have continued to fill the tabloids.
document.title: can strauss-kahn's sexual history be used against him?
lines_and_colors: in the days since dominique strauss-kahn's arrest for the attempted rape of a hotel maid, lurid details of the ex-imf chief's past sexual exploits -- both alleged and admitted -- have continued to fill the tabloids.
